name: Peaceful Warrior
description:
Peaceful Warrior is a PC Platformer game of 1 level where you play as a character that can only block attacks.

There are 3 medals that you can get: complete the level, complete the level without taking damage and complete the level in less than 9 minutes.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This is my third game, a bit bigger in work compared with the other 2 that i made:

https://kottler.itch.io/akradion

https://kottler.itch.io/space-pilots

It was a great learning experience and i dropped a lot of ideas and content for it because of time constraints.

I hope you enjoy the game. If you like it and would like to see more leave me a comment and i'll consider making two to three more levels which was the original idea. And maybe some changes to the graphics (at a point i was doing something like the image below).

Feel free to leave any kind of comment about it.

Thanks for playing!
